pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.entity

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.entity.Book

  • @Entity
public class Book
extends Object
    Represents a Book record in the database
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Book()
      Constructs a Book object.
      Book(String title, String author, String isbn, boolean isActive, boolean isAvailable, String publisher, String language, int pages, Date dateOfAdded)
      Constructs a Book with the title, author, isbn number, isActive status, isAvailable status, name of publisher, lanngauge, number of pages and date of added.

      • Book

        public Book(String title,
            String author,
            String isbn,
            boolean isActive,
            boolean isAvailable,
            String publisher,
            String language,
            int pages,
            Date dateOfAdded)
        Constructs a Book with the title, author, isbn number, isActive status, isAvailable status, name of publisher, lanngauge, number of pages and date of added.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the book
        author - The author of the book
        isbn - The ISBN number of the book
        isActive - The isActive status of the book
        isAvailable - The isAvailable status of the book
        publisher - The name of the publisher of the book
        language - The language of the book
        pages - The number of pages of the book
        dateOfAdded - The date of added of the book
